title: HORIZONS | Entry Five: The Motivation Cure
itunes:title: HORIZONS | Entry Five: The Motivation Cure
itunes:subtitle: When a budding sculptor undergoes a procedure that allows him to focus on his dreams, he quickly learns that success may not be what he wanted it to be.
description:
When a budding sculptor undergoes a procedure that allows him to focus on his dreams, he quickly learns that success may not be what he wanted it to be. The Motivation Cure is written by RK Nickel, performed by Matthew Wolf, Devon Sorvari, and Hugo Armstrong.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
